sentences.english: Using relatively density one can distinguish easily between jadeite and nephrite.
sentences.chinese: 利用相對密度可以很容易區分翡翠和軟玉。

sentences.english: The mechanism of thermal transformation for nephrite cat's eye are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並對軟玉貓眼的熱相變反應機制進行了探討。

sentences.english: Nephrite deposits in Qinghai Province have occurred in contact belt between intermediate-acidic intrusive rocks and dolomite-marble.
sentences.chinese: 青海軟玉礦牀產於中酸性侵入岩與大理岩接觸帶中。

sentences.english: Oh, you want some sweet talk?
sentences.chinese: 哦，你想聽溫香軟玉的話？

sentences.english: This paper deals with the thermal stability of nephrites in terms of DTA and TGA.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用差熱與熱重分析研究了軟玉的熱穩定性。

sentences.english: Oh, how you tease me with your sweet talk.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你爲什麼總是用溫香軟玉的話挑逗我？

sentences.english: The nephrite in Qinghai occurs within the internal contact zone between granite and marble.
sentences.chinese: 青海軟玉產於花崗岩與大理岩的內接觸帶。

definition: Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)
to buy on a considerable scale/to purchase/to procure/to stock up
to stir up public sentiment by false statements (idiom)/to resort to demagogy
to break out of an eggshell/to molt/to remove the husk/to shell
to move/to shift/to move out of the way/to divert (money etc) to a different purpose
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
